Description of incident: A scanner was found at an ATM. It was left undetected between 12:30pm and 4:20pm on Friday, September 17.  A customer reported the device the next day when it was placed at the same location again.  It appears that one customer was directly affected by unauthorized charges.  The bank is in the process of canceling cards that were used on September 17 and 18 of 2010.
